name: Love Live! School Idol Festival Artstyle and Characters
description:
This LORA aims to replicate the style of Love Live! School Idol Festival Cards but without the card layout and text. So it can be used quite well to design characters.

It's trained on ~5500 character designs based on the School Idol Festival Cards for 4 epochs. The training image resolutions and ratios vary but every character was on a white background, so the tags simple background and white background are recommended if you want more focus on the character.

The trigger word is LLChar.

Additional it is able to quite accurately replicate the main casts of the anime if you include their name and some attributes about them such as the hair and eye color.

All example images are made with Anything V3.0.

As always criticism, recommendations and advice are greatly appreciated.

modelVersions.name: v2.0-8
modelVersions.description: V2.0 but trained for 8 epochs. Keeps the clothes and characters more on-model
